name: Zilla Quest
description:
• WASD to move
  • E to interact/speak
  • Click abilities/enemies in battle
  • Rest in tents to save your game.

Jam submission for Mini Jam 81. Theme: Kaiju, Limitation: "Death isn't the end"

Source code: https://github.com/cornibulus/kaiju

Addl credits:

  • Some sprites from https://www.kenney.nl/assets/bit-pack
  • Some portraits from artbreeder.com
  • Used deepmaze palette from https://lospec.com/palette-list/deepmaze
